patthana15.64:4.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.64:4.2: Narūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.64:5.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
